page.title: 14CUSTOMS-EVENTS,BRIDGEND.
page.content: Litchard Junior School,Coity Village, and Bridgend Hospital hold annual fetes.Litchard's attractions include the Red Devils Parachute Team,The Police Motor Cycle Team,the School folk-dancers,Penyfai folk-dancers and the School gymnastics squad. On November 5th,Guy Fawkes night, there is a fireworks display at the Brewery Field,Bridgend Rugby Football Club's ground. On Boxing Day there is a fun run through Bridgend.Both events are organised for charity. To celebrate St.George's Day,The scouts parade through town and end at the Cenotaph with a service.There is also a service there on Remembrance Day,Nov.11th. In July Bridgend Agricultural Show is held in Newbridge Fields and a Drama Festival takes place in May.
